DOC.brief_summary: The main goal of this study is to assess whether use of earplugs has any effect on sleep, sleep apnea, and daytime sleepiness in individuals who snore.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Earplugs on Sleep and Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Adults, ages 18 or older Scheduled at the University of Michigan Sleep Disorders Center for a diagnostic polysomnogram to evaluate for sleepdisordered breathing Medical, psychiatric or other conditions that would interfere with interpretation of the results of the sleep studies or the subject's ability to complete the Stanford Sleepiness Scale
DOC.keyword: snoring, sleep disordered breathing, polysomnography, sleep fragmentation
